name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ All Star
description: 'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ All Star' (stylization of うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪ All Star) is a rhythmic otome video game made for the PlayStation Portable on March 7th, 2013. It is the seventh entry to be made for the main series, although unlike its previous titles, mainly focuses on the members of QUARTET NIGHT. Despite this, there are still unlockable routes that the player may undertake (Rainbow Route & Teacher Route) which contain mini scenarios for ST☆RISH. This entry received a direct sequel known as 'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ All Star After Secret', as well as a special edition for the Nintendo Switch in 2021.
